entries.title: T-Mobile reports another data breach, impacting 37 million customers
entries.description: The wireless carrier, which has been hit by multiple large data breaches in recent years, said no sensitive customer information was compromised in the latest incident.

entries.title: How to find out if an AirTag is tracking you
entries.description: Apple's tracker is meant to help you find frequently lost items -- not people.

entries.title: How to connect your AirPods to an iPhone (and just about any other device)
entries.description: This quick guide details the easy steps required to connect your AirPods (regardless of their generation) and AirPods Pro to your iPhone, Mac, iPad, Windows 10 PCs, and Android phones and tablets.

entries.title: How to check if your VPN is working (and what to do if your VPN won't connect)
entries.description: Are you unsure if your virtual private network (VPN) is working? Are you having trouble connecting? Here are some tips for running your VPN successfully.

entries.title: How to easily share a printer from the GNOME desktop
entries.description: If you need to share a printer across a network and GNOME is your Linux desktop of choice, the process is much easier than you think.

entries.title: The HovRanger e-bike is $500 cheaper but just as capable as my daily commuter
entries.description: Review: The Hovsco HovRanger is a great-looking commuter bike that can freely hit 28mph thanks to its Class 3 rating.

entries.title: How to set up a VPN on your router
entries.description: Setting up a VPN on your router can protect the computers and devices on your network. Here's how to pull this off.

entries.title: Best Buy's four-day sale ends today: Shop our best deals picks
entries.description: The savings include $400 off an LG OLED TV and $200 off a MacBook Air M1.

entries.title: The Amazon Echo Show 10 is 22% off today
entries.description: This two-in-one smart home hub is perfect to build out one of the most up-to-date systems yet.

entries.title: Logitech releases affordable webcams with remote and hybrid workers in mind
entries.description: Logitech's new line of webcams brings a stylish flare to working from home without compromising audio and camera quality.

entries.title: Boston Dynamics just dropped a new video. Look what its humanoid robot can do now
entries.description: Atlas just got a massive upgrade – some grippers. Now, the robot can toss and grab things, in addition to excelling in parkour.

entries.title: How to connect your Chromebook to a network printer
entries.description: Chromebooks can print just like any other laptop or desktop. Find out how easy it is to add a printer to your favorite laptop.

entries.title: Nvidia shows how surprisingly hard it is for a robot to pick up a chicken wing
entries.description: The chipmaker is showcasing how a robotics startup is using its simulation platform to train robots to pick up food like pieces of chicken.

entries.title: This Motorola x Pantone collab is a special edition phone done right
entries.description: Bored with black slabs? Motorola's new vegan leather-backed phone in Pantone's Color of the Year is stunning.

entries.title: The top Best Buy tech gifts of 2023
entries.description: Need a tech gift for someone special? Best Buy has you covered with headphones, home audio, smartwatches, and more.

entries.title: The 5 best cheap webcams of 2023
entries.description: A webcam shouldn't cost you a fortune. We found the best cheap webcams with fantastic performance so you can look and feel your best in video calls.

entries.title: These are my 3 must-have Raspberry Pi accessories
entries.description: If you've got a Raspberry Pi, you know how great they are, but these three accessories make a great device even better.

entries.title: AI improves field service quality and customer experience
entries.description: Research shows that 80% of high performing field service organizations use artificial intelligence.

entries.title: Firefox finally declutters the toolbar with the Unified Extensions button
entries.description: In a move that will satisfy users with a preference for a minimalist aesthetic, Firefox developers have added a new feature to remove some of the clutter from the UI.

entries.title: Tech spending is still going up, just. Here's where the money is going
entries.description: Growth predictions are cut back, but there's still money for some projects at least.

entries.title: Samsung launches flash Q-Series soundbar sale
entries.description: The Q-Series soundbar sale is a perfect opportunity to upgrade your living room audio before the games begin.
